text: Ate madayana de vala usa de bhara su'aiba nu bheji'a. Usa ne kiha ki he meri kaumma! Alaha di badagi karo, usa tom' binham tuhada ko'i pujanayoga nahim. Napa tola vica kade ghata na tolo, maim tuhanu cagi halata vica dekha riha ham ate maim' tuhanu ika ghera laina vale dina di afata tom darada ham
